GSD.product_version: versions from v4.4 to before v5.15.78
GSD.description:
nfc: nfcmrvl: Fix potential memory leak in nfcmrvl_i2c_nci_send()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.78 by commit 5dfdac5e3f8db5f4445228c44f64091045644a3b, it was introduced in version v4.4 by commit b5b3e23e4cace008e1a30e8614a484d14dfd07a1. For more details please see the references link.
